long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ExplainKit extension let's you easily create audio-visual explainers for all your webpages. 

These explainers play just like video without the user having to leave your website.
Create one for free from explainkit.com.

For more info, just watch the explainers on our website itself.
